mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_house ( fileseq, filename, filerealname, filesize, folderPath, id, ins_dt ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(fileseq) + 1, 1) FROM file_house A), #{fileName}, #{fileRealName}, #{fileSize}, #{folderPath}, #{id}, sysdate() )
INSERT INTO file_folder ( folderSeq, folderName, id, ins_dt ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(folderSeq) + 1, 1) FROM file_folder A), #{folderName}, #{id}, sysdate() )
